alert.note: Alert for Assumption; East Baton Rouge; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; West Baton Rouge; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 1:31AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. John The Baptist, Ascension, St. James, southeastern West Baton Rouge, southwestern Livingston, Iberville, northwestern Lafourche, south central East Baton Rouge and Assumption Parishes through 200 AM CDT... At 130 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over St. Gabriel, or 7 miles east of Plaquemine, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Plaquemine, Napoleonville, Reserve, Oak Hills Place, Laplace, St. Gabriel, Gramercy, Lutcher, White Castle, Sorrento, French Settlement, Port Vincent, Geismar, Garyville, Supreme, Bayou Sorrel, Whitehall and Old Jefferson. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 166 and 207. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; East Baton Rouge; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; West Baton Rouge; Western Ascension
